item.title: connection
item.description: 13:24 Thursday 08 December 2016 JST Hey Louis CK, the free Wifi at Wired Cafe was amazing but could have been a lot better.

item.title: IBM Bluemix customer support
item.description:
09:33 Sunday 21 February 2016 JST A few days ago I was excited to see IBM encouraging blockchain technology. It’s new uncharted territory in my mind so I thought hey cool some big players are encouraging it. I tried to sign up for their service and was spooked by their password restrictions. Only 31 characters, and no ‘special’ characters.
So I wrote them a little email: only 31 character passwords?
